1.title: Wash Buckler, Stink Bomb & Skylanders SWAP Force
1.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon reveals the story behind the SWAP Force team and shares his favorite new combination when he swaps WASH BUCKLER with STINK BOMB to form: STINK BUCKLER! And Fryno makes a special appearance.

2.title: SWAPtober, Rattle Shake & Launch Party in New York
2.plot: Zachary Gordon celebrates the beginning of Swaptober by heading to New York for the Skylanders Swap Force launch party.

3.title: Countdown, Blast Zone & Magna Charge
3.plot: Host Zachary Gordon shows off some protips on how to explore special zones using Blast Zone and Magna Charge. And he gives you a special behind the scenes look at the latest Skylanders SWAP Force TV commercial.

4.title: Halloween Boomtacular with the Skylanders Boy and Girl
4.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon celebrates Halloween with Pumpkin Eye Brawl and Fire Kraken with a special appearance from The Skylanders Boy and Girl.

5.title: Scorp, Woodburrow, & Dark Edition Starter Pack
5.plot: The latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon gives an inside look at Woodburrow, The Dark Edition Starter Pack, and Skylander's King of Sting, Scorp.

6.title: Slobber Tooth Short Cut and Grilla Drilla Tips
6.plot: Host Zachary Gordon brings back fan favorite Skylanders Short Cuts with Slobber Tooth and teaches you how to make some monkey mayhem with Grilla Drilla.

7.title: Skylanders Boy and Girl & Spy Rise
7.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon gives you an inside look at EB Games Australia, everything you need to know about Spy Rise, and a Q&A with Skylanders Boy and Girl!

8.title: Night Shift & Freeze Blade Short Cut and Skylanders SWAP Force Game Truck
8.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon gives you a sneak peak at the Skylanders SWAP Force Game Truck and delivers another Skylanders Short Cut featuring Night Shift & Freeze Blade.

9.title: Dune Bug, Robert Welkner Speed Swap Competition!
9.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon gives you an inside look at Dune Bug, and guest Skylanders guru Robert Welkner competes in a game of Speed Swap.

10.title: Evan from EvanTubeHD, LightCore Flashwing, Grim Creeper, and Rubble Rouser!
10.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon is joined by Evan, from EvanTubeHD, for an unboxing of Rubble Rouser, along with an inside look at Grim Creeper and LightCore Flashwing!

11.title: Pop Thorn, Skylanders Collection Vault App, Time Attack Mode Hints
11.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Host Zachary Gordon gives you an inside look at Pop Thorn, the Skylanders Collection Vault app, and how to beat time attack mode.

12.title: Holiday Episode, Fire Kraken Short Cut, and Boom Jet Tips
12.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. In this special holiday episode, host Zachary Gordon answers viewer questions, and gives you an inside look at Boom Jet, along with a Short Cut featuring Fire Kraken.

13.title: New Year's Episode, Rip Tide and Smolderdash
13.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. In this New Year's episode, host Zachary Gordon reads you Skylanders' New Year's resolutions, as well as giving you an inside look at Rip Tide and Smolderdash.

14.title: Wind-Up, Sheep Wreck Islands, and More!
14.plot: Skylanders Boomcast brings you the latest in Skylanders SWAP Force news. Zachary Gordon introduces you to a host of Skylanders, as well as giving you an inside look at Wind-Up, and the Sheep Wreck Islands.
